branchCategory.name: Integrated Display
branchCategory.description: <p>Pneumatic sensors with buttons and a display to set and read values from an operator's position.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE20, Digital Pressure Sensor, 3 Screen 1 Output, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>ISE20 is a digital pressure sensor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.  ISE20 saves energy with only 25mA current consumption.  Further, the switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  ISE20 is UL/CSA and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE20A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 3 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>ISE20A is a digital pressure sensor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.  Compared to the ISE20, the ISE20A adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog voltage or current output.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Response time can be adjusted to reduce chattering.  ISE20A is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE20B, Digital Pressure Sensor, 3 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ISE20B is a digital pressure sensor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting lable and its numeric value in orange.  Compared to the ISE20, ISE20B adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog voltage or current output.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Response time can be adjusted to reduce chattering.  ISE20B is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE20B-L, Digital Pressure Sensor, 3 Screen IP65 with IO-Link
branchItem.description: <p>ISE20B-L is a digital pressure sensor supporting the IO-Link communication protocol.  When paired with an IO-Link master, measured values, and settings can be accessed from the HMI screen of a PLC.  ISE20B-L incorporates IO-Link version 1.1 and COM2 speed.  16-bit process data include 2 switch outputs, a diagnosis bit, and 13 bits for measured pressure value.  The 3-screen, 3-color display shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, and the setting label and its numerical value in orange.  ISE20B-L is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE70, Digital Pressure Sensor, 3 Screen IP67 with IO Link
branchItem.description: <p>This next generation ISE70 pressure sensor provides continuous quantitative values, as well as switched digital outputs when pressure set points are met.  This sensor is also IO-Link compatible.  Sensor information, such as identity, functional state, cable connection, and current or switch values can be set or monitored remotely though an IO-Link master, and connected to a fieldbus network.  The ISE70 is designed for abusive environments that may also include splashed coolant, lubricants or grime.  Electronics are packaged in a metal housing, while the piping connection is a stout lug with female threads, which together protect the sensor against accidental collisions with other objects in the area.  A smooth display face with membrane type buttons avoids contamination from grit and sticky residue that could clog or jam raised rubber buttons.  The display is angled and can rotate 336 degrees, to permit easy reading when indirectly mounted.  The main screen shows instantaneous values in red or green, while the sub screen setting appear in orange.  Switch indicators will also light when set points are reached.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE10, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, Compact
branchItem.description: <p>ISE10 is a compact pressure sensor suitable for mounting in panels or tight spaces.  This sensor has an integrated alphanumeric LED display with red and green LED switch indicators.  Switch delay time is 2.5ms, while current consumption is 40mA.  ISE10 meets UL/CSA, CE and RoHS standards, and has an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE40A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ISE40A is a digital pressure sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.  Available M12 cable option.  ISE40A is UL/CSA, CE, and RoHS compliant with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ISE40A legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ISE20B.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

branchItem.name: ISE40A, Digital Pressure Sensor, with M8 Connector, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ISE40A is a digital pressure sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.  Includes M8 cable connector.  ISE40A is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ISE40 legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ISE20B.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>ISE30A is a digital pressure sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ISE30A legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ISE20A.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Panel Mount Adapter, Front Protection Cover
branchItem.description: <p>For series ISE30(A) & ZSE30(A) digital pressure/vacuum switches. Optional front protection cover.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Lead Wire with Connector
branchItem.description: <p>Lead wire for series ISE30(A) & ZSE30(A) digital pressure/vacuum switches. Multiple connector options.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Mounting Bracket
branchItem.description: <p>For series ISE30(A) & ZSE30(A) digital pressure/vacuum switches.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A One-Touch Fitting
branchItem.description: <p>One-Touch Fitting for series ISE30(A) & ZSE30(A) digital pressure/vacuum switches. Multiple sizes and types.</p>

branchItem.name: PPA, Handheld Manometer, for Portable Pressure Measurement
branchItem.description: <p>PPA is a handheld pressure measuring device, also known as a manometer.  Optional pressure ranges include high and low pressure, or vacuum.  Simple controls include a power button and a back light for viewing the display in dark locations.  The meter is battery operated and shuts off automatically after 5 minutes without use.  Connect to a pressurized system with the attached one-touch fitting.  Display can show instantaneous pressure, or hold the peak or bottom pressure during the connection.  PPA manometers are CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>
